meanings: 실용회화-시계점 It runs all right, but it loses about three minutes a day.

vlive.korean: '저 수염이 느려? 아니면 항상 긁어?' "Is your mustache slow? Or do you always scratch it?" 듣기 View video GOT7 : 금겸🌼
vlive.english: "Is your mustache slow? Or do you always scratch it?"

vlive.korean: [준비 운동] - 내가 타자 속도가 느려 - 이거 어떻게 해야 되지? [Warming up] - I'm too slow at typing. - How can I describe it? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Warming up] - I'm too slow at typing. - How can I describe it?

vlive.korean: 오케이! 느려 느려 - 그만하라고! OK! Slow, so slow. - Stop! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준 : 게임의 정석
움직임이 느려, 뭔가 - 느리지? He's slow. - Slow, right? 듣기 View video TWICE : 부의세계...
"찬희vs재윤 누가 더 느려요?" "CHA NI vs JAE YOON, who talks more slowly?" 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 그래서 하고 싶은 말이 뭔데?! 셒구가.. 귀여워요..😭 (JAEYOON&YOUNGBIN talking about JAEYOON’s way of speaking)
vlive.english: "CHA NI vs JAE YOON, who talks more slowly?"

examples.korean: My internet connection has been lagging all day. 발음듣기 오늘 인터넷 연결이 너무 느려. DARAKWON
examples.english: My internet connection has been lagging all day. 발음

examples.korean: The Strathspey dance looks slow but watching it relaxes me.. 발음듣기 스트라스스페이 춤은 느려 보이지만 보고 있으면 마음이 편하다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The Strathspey dance looks slow but watching it relaxes me.. 발음

examples.korean: My comouter is really slow. It must be infected with a virus. 발음듣기 바이러스에 걸렸는지 컴퓨터가 너무 느려요. Neungyule
examples.english: My comouter is really slow. It must be infected with a virus. 발음

examples.korean: My computer is slow today. 발음듣기 오늘 제 컴퓨터가 느려요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My computer is slow today. 발음

examples.korean: This printer is so slow! 발음듣기 이 프린터는 너무 느려요! YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
